EVENTS.ERROR_DISCONNECTED: Connection issue to the server. Please check your internet connection.

SEARCH_BAR.BUNDLE_FILE_HINT: The bundle file to search into (only available if a single workspace is selected).

KEY.LABEL: Translation Key
KEY.LABEL_HINT: Search translations associated to the specified key pattern. This pattern can be the beginning, the end, a part of keys to search for.
KEY.PLACEHOLDER: Fill how the translation key should look like
KEY.STARTS_WITH_TOOLTIP: Search translations having keys starting with the specified pattern.
KEY.CONTAINS_TOOLTIP: Search translations having keys containing the specified pattern.
KEY.EQUALS_TOOLTIP: Search translations having the specified key.
KEY.ENDS_WITH_TOOLTIP: Search translations having keys ending with the specified pattern.

SEARCH_BAR.CRITERION_HINT: Which kind of translations to look for?
SEARCH_BAR.TITLE: Search {criterion, select, ALL{for all translations} MISSING_TRANSLATIONS{for missing translations} TRANSLATIONS_CURRENT_USER_UPDATED{for translations that I have updated} UPDATED_TRANSLATIONS{for updated translations} other{}}{workspaces, select, true{ for all workspaces} null{} other { on workspaces {workspaces}}}{locales, select, true{ for all locales} null{} other{ for locales {locales}}}.

TABLE.UNSAVED_CHANGES: Your changes are not saved yet

TABLE.DELETE_CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE: Please confirm the deletion of the following translations: {translations}.
TABLE.DELETE_ALL_CONFIRMATION: Are-you sure to delete all the dictionary entries?

UPLOAD_POPUP.TITLE: Upload a Dictionary
UPLOAD_POPUP.DESCRIPTION: Drag & Drop your CSV dictionary file, or click on the button.

ERROR.DELETE: Error while deleting the dictionary entry.
ERROR.CREATE: Error while creating a dictionary entry.
ERROR.UPLOAD: Error while uploading the CSV dictionary file.

DELETE.CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE:
Please confirm the deletion of the locale {locale}.

Translations in that locale won't be available anymore.

USERS.PASSWORD_COPIED: The user's password has been copied to your clipboard.

DELETE.CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE:
{internal, select, true{Please confirm the deletion of the internal user {user}.

This user won't be able to access the application anymore.} null{} other {Please confirm the deletion of the external user {user}.

This user won't be deleted from the external system. Deleting this user does not prevent him to log in the application in the future.}}

POPUP.TITLE: Publish Modifications
POPUP.WORKSPACES_FIELD_HINT: Modifications of the selected workspaces will be published.
POPUP.COMMENT_FIELD_HINT: Free comment that will be used to describe modifications.
POPUP.UNKNOWN_ERROR: A technical error happened, please verify the configuration and try again.
POPUP.ERROR_TITLE: The following errors happened when publishing translations:

EXPLORE.BUNDLE_FILE_EXCLUDED: The bundle file has been excluded from all workspaces of this repository. This bundle file will disappear the next time you synchronize this workspace. You can configure all the exclusions in the current screen.

ERROR.EXCLUDING_BUNDLE_FILE: Error while excluding a bundle file.

GITHUB.USER_NAME_HINT: The username owner of the repository.
GITHUB.ACCESS_KEY_HINT: The access key used to access (read/write) the repository.

GIT.NAME: Name
GIT.NAME_HINT: Repository name displayed in this tool.
GIT.USER_NAME_HINT: Username to use to access (read/write) the repository (optional)

STEP_CREATION.CREATED_NEXT: You can now initialize it by clicking on "next", or do it later.
STEP_CREATION.UNKNOWN_ERROR: A technical error happened, please verify the configuration and try again.
STEP_CREATION.ERROR_TITLE: Error while creating your repository, please go back.

STEP_INITIALIZATION.UNKNOWN_ERROR: A technical error happened, please try again later.
STEP_INITIALIZATION.ERROR_TITLE: Error while initializing your repository, please go back.

VIEW_CARD.WORKSPACES_READY: {number} workspaces are initialized and ready to use
VIEW_CARD.WORKSPACES_NOT_READY: no workspace is initialized and ready to use
VIEW_CARD.ACCESS_ALLOWED: You, {displayName}, are allowed to synchronize and publish
VIEW_CARD.ACCESS_FORBIDDEN: You, {displayName}, are not allowed to synchronize and publish

CONFIG_CARD.DEFAULT_BRANCH_HINT: Default branch to use when searching.
CONFIG_CARD.ALLOWED_BRANCHES_HINT: Regex specifying which branches will be scanned.
CONFIG_CARD.AUTO_SYNCHRONIZED_HINT: Is the repository automatically synchronized in a regular basis?

DELETE.CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE:
Please confirm the deletion of the repository {repository}.

The local repository and its configuration will be removed. All modifications that are not published will be lost.

GITHUB_WEB_HOOK_POPUP.TITLE: Manage Web Hook Secret
GITHUB_WEB_HOOK_POPUP.SECRET_HINT: Secret to use to secure the WebHook endpoint. Afterwards, this secret must be used on GitHub side.
GITHUB_WEB_HOOK_POPUP.SECRET_COPIED: The secret has been copied to your clipboard.
GITHUB_WEB_HOOK_POPUP.UNKNOWN_ERROR: A technical error happened, please verify the Web Hook configuration and try again.
GITHUB_WEB_HOOK_POPUP.ERROR_TITLE: The following errors happened when updating the Web Hook:

GITHUB_ACCESS_KEY_POPUP.TITLE: Manage Access Key
GITHUB_ACCESS_KEY_POPUP.KEY_HINT: The access key used to access your GitHub repository (pull, push, create pull requests, ...).
GITHUB_ACCESS_KEY_POPUP.UNKNOWN_ERROR: A technical error happened, please verify the Access Key configuration and try again.
GITHUB_ACCESS_KEY_POPUP.ERROR_TITLE: The following errors happened when updating the Access Key:

GIT_CREDENTIALS_POPUP.TITLE: Manage Credentials
GIT_CREDENTIALS_POPUP.USERNAME_HINT: Username to use to access (read/write) the repository (optional)
GIT_CREDENTIALS_POPUP.UNKNOWN_ERROR: A technical error happened, please verify credentials and try again.
GIT_CREDENTIALS_POPUP.ERROR_TITLE: The following errors happened when updating credentials:

TRANSLATIONS_CONFIG_POPUP.TITLE: Configure Exclusions of Keys and Bundle Files
TRANSLATIONS_CONFIG_POPUP.NEW_IGNORED_KEY_HINT: Ignored keys won't be display in the searcher.
TRANSLATIONS_CONFIG_POPUP.NEW_IGNORED_PATH_HINT: Bundles files matching the path (following Ant syntax) will be ignored.
TRANSLATIONS_CONFIG_POPUP.UNKNOWN_ERROR: A technical error happened, please verify credentials and try again.
TRANSLATIONS_CONFIG_POPUP.ERROR_TITLE: The following errors happened when updating configuration:

TABLE.RESTORE_CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE:
Please confirm the restoration of the snapshot {snapshot}.

All current data will be erased. Data from the snapshot will be restored.
TABLE.DELETE_CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE: Please confirm the deletion of the snapshot {snapshot}.

CREATION_CARD.TITLE: Create a new Snapshot
CREATION_CARD.PASSWORD_HINT: Password used to encrypt the ZIP file containing the snapshot.

IMPORT_CARD.TITLE: Import a Snapshot
IMPORT_CARD.PASSWORD_HINT: Password used to encrypt the ZIP file containing the snapshot.

ERROR.DOWNLOAD: Error while downloading the snapshot file.
ERROR.CREATE: Error while creating a new snapshot.

ERROR.GET_ALL_DEFINITIONS: Error while retrieving scheduled tasks definitions.
ERROR.SCHEDULE_UNSCHEDULE: Error while scheduling/un-scheduling the task definition.
ERROR.GET_EXECUTIONS: Error while retrieving scheduled task executions.
